price: 69. Iró qaraanal tan malayka itta elle wayteemih ixxiga luk mananniyo, Nabii Aadam ginóh caagidil itta keemaarisen waqdi Yallak wacyi yol oobewannay.
arabic: مَا كَانَ لِيَ مِنۡ عِلۡمِۭ بِٱلۡمَلَإِ ٱلۡأَعۡلَىٰٓ إِذۡ يَخۡتَصِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: mā kāna liya min ʿil'min bil-mala-i al-aʿlā idh yakhtaṣimūna
